version_description: • Bug fix with dragging card from hand

• Now we have more servers.
• Improvements by players requests.
• Bug fixes.

Bugs fixes
Added "Higher" League - purple
Fixed display of envelope at Friends screen
Bug fixes
Fixed a bug that caused in some cases, the inability to reconnect to the game after disconnection.

• Now the seasonal leaderboards.
• Optimized for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6+.
• Additional cards shirts, sets of smiles and decorations on the avatar.
• Sending pictures in messages.
bug fix of interface for iOS 6.

• Hall of Fame for season winners.
• New information available in the user profile view: achievements, assets, rating.
• Profile view from the leaderboards.
• Two new achievements.

Fast game mode
Assets present.
Deutsch, Italiano, Français, Español, עִבְרִית, Армянский, Türkçe, Azərbaycan, Українська мова
Sharing with WhatsApp and Viber

Bug fix for writing a message.
Switch of languages added.

• Fixed connection error that occurs over 3G on some SIM-cards.
• Delete of all chat messages with one button.
• Increased area for cheat cards on the iPhone4.

• Achievements can now be used on avatar.
• Added the ability for add tags for users, visible only for you.
• Fixed errors in the translation to Hebrew and Spanish.
• Fixed minor bugs.

• Added a warning when changing iCloud.
• Added support for VoiceOver (detailed in the rules).
• To delete a friend and message in the correspondence, you can now click on the cross.
• Fixed displaying the total number of achievements.
• The number of users tag has been increased.
• Fixed work with photos in iOS 11.
• Bonuses for regular players:
   - Once in 20 hours we give players a bonus to the rating for one of the victories in the game.
   - This bonus grows every time players receive it (up to a 30-fold multiplier for the victory).
   - If the player has not played for more than 44 hours, the bonus is reduced to the lower level.

• bug fix with iOS 7 on game screen
• bug fix with achieves count

• Optimisation for iPhone X
• Fixed minor bugs

Fixed saving of the picture in the chat
Fixed sharing
Fixed chat message input field on iPhone X
Fixed crashes when turning the screen on iPhone4

Added the ability to reply to a message directly from the notification
Draw (optional)
Minor bugfix
iPhone XS Max support
Minor bugfix

Added the ability to reply to a message directly from the notification
Draw (optional)

• Added new assets
• Added a new type of assets - collection
• Added the ability to disable emoticons
• Added ability to disable award animations

• Added new assets
• Added a new type of assets - collection
• Added the ability to disable emoticons
• Added ability to disable award animations

Bug fix with enabling collection smiles in games.
Also in this version:
• Added new assets
• Added a new type of assets - collection
• Added the ability to disable emoticons
• Added ability to disable award animations
Added "Quick game"
Tournaments

Tournaments
Fix animations
Tournaments update
